About-Text:
Hello,
My name is Eden Gedj.
I've always loved crafting, creating art, and designing.
For me, jewellery holds a special place in my heart; it's truly one of my greatest passions.
Jewellery has the power to highlight the unique light of the person wearing it.
It is much more than just an accessory or body decoration; it carries a story, energy, memories, and even family heritage.

That's why jewellery excites me.
When I'm in my workshop, creating a new piece, I feel like I'm in another universe—where time doesn't exist, and I'm fully immersed in a state of creative flow.
It's a feeling that's hard to put into words.

My sources of inspiration are influenced by different periods in history, ideas from the spiritual world; Kabbalah, and Jewish scriptures.
The jewellery displayed on the site is unique and handmade, crafted from 925 sterling silver or 14/18k gold and gemstones. 
In addition, I create custom-made jewellery tailored to individual wishes.

Enjoy the magic!
